nodes.text: The Cardan IV-class space station was the fourth model of Cardan-class space station built for the Galactic Empire.

These stations supplemented the earlier Cardan-class models. It housed a number of squadrons of TIE/LN starfighters and TIE/sa bombers, and could call in nearby Acclamator II-class assault ships as well as Tartan-class patrol cruisers in the event of an assault on the station.
